info.title: Epilepsii
info.author: Albatross
info.details:
Epilepsii:
A reasonably good* strobe for the Wii - Support for colors!
In future versions (if they exist!) a GUI for color choosing is planned.
DIRECTIONS:
Use the D-Pad, A, and B buttons to select color.
Use + and - to choose strobe frequency. Max. is 60 Hz.
Set at Maximum frequency by default.
Press Home at any time to exit.

Despite the name, do not under _any_ circumstances use this homebrew
application if you are epileptic or have seizures when exposed to
patterns of flashing lights.

For best results, use in a dark room, set to white, lower frequency slightly,
and dance like an octopus.

You have been warned.

Author not responsible for what you do with Epilepsii.

*by reasonably good, I mean mediocre.
